name: Rerollver
description:
It was unwise to ask for a Monopoly at a wargame store.
Now you have been transformed into a miniature model.
Around you, wargame models and dice. In your hand, a gun that shoots fate.
Survive the waves of enemies, ignore the wargame lore, and get you freedom!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • R - Reload (aka Reroll)
  • You will only deal damage if your roll is higher or equal to the face of the die you shoot.
  • Shoot at the stray dice to get healing out of them.
